pages.text: You can easily build a nether portal yourself. All you need is a $(l:items/flint_and_steel)flint and steel$() and at least ten $(l:blocks/obsidian)obsidian$(), crying obsidian or infused obsidian. It can be built any size, the size seen to the right is the minimum. The corners can be any block, it is common to fill them with obsidian as well.

pages.name: Nether Portal
pages.text: Once you finish building it, you need to light it up by simply igniting any obsidian block inside the frame.
